title: Gemma Collins shows off slimmed-down face and amazing cheekbones after weight loss
text:

Gemma Collins has showed off her incredible weight loss once again as she aims to shed the stone for a boob job.

The 38-year-old TOWIE star revealed she wants to go under the knife to get her 38GG breasts reduced in size, after losing a whopping three stone in weight since the start of this year.

Gemma, who kicked off her diet and fitness streak when she took part in Dancing On Ice, shared her face gains in a beautiful close-up snap.

The blonde bombshell donned a sparkly green and pink turban for the picture, styling her long hair into gentle tumbling locks that cascaded over her shoulders.

(Image: Instagram)

Gemma smouldered as she gazed into the camera while wearing a plunging emerald green silk top with a flash of her black lacy bra peeking through.

Her bright blue eyes were framed with enormous luscious false lashes, while her full pout was given a slick of nude lipgloss.

The star looked totally unrecognisable with her new look, after revealing she's got even more plans to overhaul her body.

"I'd be really happy if I lost six stone as that would bring me down to 12 stone and a size 16," she recently announced.

(Image: Instagram)

"My boobs are so big and I want to get them reduced in January, but I have to lose three stone before they can operate.

"My boobs are 38GG now and I think I will go down to a C or a D-cup. The operation is all booked in. I think when you have big boobs, they can make you look bigger and I would just love to never ever wear a bra again."

It comes after Gemma reportedly told on/off boyfriend James 'Arg' Argent that their relationship is over until he sorts out his problems.

Arg was recently the subject of a police welfare check at his Essex home, after Gemma raised the alarm following 12 hours of him not returning her calls.

Police and paramedics turned up at his home to check up on him, but Arg later explained it was a "misunderstanding".

(Image: SplashNews.com)

"I didn't have my phone on me because it was charging downstairs. I have put her [Gemma] through a lot so I completely understand her worry," he told OK! magazine.

"She remembers what she’s been through in the past with me so she thought the worst."

Arg, who was axed from TOWIE over failing a drugs test, added that he is struggling with binge-eating and is working with a therapist to address his relationship with food.

"My biggest problem is my eating disorder. I have always struggled with it since my teens," he said.

"When I'm in a bad place I binge eat, and when I put on weight it then triggers more issues."
description: Gemma Collins has been losing weight in an attempt to get a boob job early next year - and wants to end up at 12 stone
